comment.author: 23546986@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called RPO RAILWAY POST OFFICE - MAIL TRAIN, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 67908005@N02
comment._content: When adding this interesting photo to the Clerestory Coaches (Railways) Group, as only the picture owner can do this, please kindly geotag, where possible, to identify the location of this picture, for the benefit of many of the world wide members! Perhaps, in this case, the location of the Museum in DC, or of the (US) National Postal Museum, In case of need see this set, ideally run as a slideshow. Many thanks.
